alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 08 at 2:22PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Western Escambia County in south central Alabama... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 122 PM CDT, The public reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to training thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain has fallen and additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches is expected. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Atmore, McCullough, I65 And AL 21, I65 And CR 1, Poarch Creek Reservation, Martinville, Mount Gillis, Freemanville, Robinsonville, Poarch, Malta, Canoe, Little Rock, Nokomis, Sardine, Huxford and Stanley Crossroads.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
